qoutes.text: Let's fuckin' date this shit up!
Good luck, I know I can be a real bitch to win over.
Good work! Bring it in for today.
I don't know much about this game. Is it anything like sex? I know a lot about that!
Oh heeeeyy, look who decided to show up.
Don't worry, nobody can see me!
The objective is to win. We're clear on that, right?
Alright, saddle up. Lets do this shit!
Come on! Seduce me with your sexy puzzle skills!
Could you do me a huge favor and show up even later next time?
Really? I know I've taught you better than that.
Alright look, if you want this gig you gotta listen to directions.
